text: Naf River is a river that starts in Myanmar and flows into the Bay of Bengal. The lower part of the river marks the border of Bangladesh and Myanmar. It starts in the Arakan hills. Its width varies from 1.61 km to 3.22 km. The Naf River's average depth is and maximum depth is . Category:Rivers of Myanmar Category:Rivers of Bangladesh Category:Bay of Bengal
title: Naf River
